page.title: 06A CHILD'S LEISURE TIME
page.content:
On Monday my Mum drives me to my piano lesson at a lady's house in Dereham, about 3 miles away. It lasts for 30 minutes. On Tuesdays and Fridays I go swimming in Dereham with a club called The Otters. About 30 people go and we spend 45 minutes practising breast, butterfly,front and back strokes. Brownies is on Thursday evenings. I am in Leprechaun which is one of 6 groups.There are 7 children in my group. 0n Saturday I go to tap and modern dancing classes at Dereham Theatre School. Our lessons last 90 minutes. On Sunday I go swimming at Swanton Morley.The pool belongs to the primary school there.
By Megan aged nine.
